sentences.en: A cart was making its way up the hill.
sentences.cn: 一辆马车正在爬上山丘。

sentences.en: A chill wind blew at the top of the hill.
Arnold had his head down, gasping as he toiled up the hill.
sentences.cn: 阿诺德垂着头，一边费劲地往山上爬一边气喘吁吁。

sentences.en: Dave Hill's article makes the right point about the Taylor Report.
sentences.cn: 戴夫·希尔的文章对《泰勒报告》的看法是正确的。

sentences.en: Europe's biggest Stone Age earthworks are at Silbury Hill in Wiltshire.
sentences.cn: 欧洲石器时期最大的土木防御工事位于威尔特郡的西尔布利山。

sentences.en: He closed his door and started the quarter-mile walk down the hill.
sentences.cn: 他关上门,踏上了1/4英里长的下山路.

sentences.en: He doesn't take kindly to suggestions that he is over the hill.
sentences.cn: 他不爱听别人说他风光不再。

sentences.en: He turned his back on them and stomped off up the hill.
sentences.cn: 他转身不理他们，噔噔噔地爬上了山。

sentences.en: I was running down the hill shouting, "Michael, Michael, man, wait up".
sentences.cn: 我边往山下跑边喊：“迈克尔，迈克尔，嘿，等等我。”

sentences.en: Thames television announced a re-run of the Benny Hill Show.
sentences.cn: 泰晤士电视台宣布重播《班尼·希尔秀》。

sentences.en: The countdown to the Notting Hill Carnival is in its final hours.
sentences.cn: 诺丁山狂欢节已经进入了最后几个小时的倒计时。

sentences.en: The days of big-time racing at Herne Hill had gone for good.
sentences.cn: 在赫恩山举行盛大赛马会的日子早已一去不复返了。

sentences.en: The engine started, revved and the car jerked away down the hill.
sentences.cn: 引擎发动了，油门加大后车冲下了山坡。

sentences.en: The Newton Hotel is halfway up a steep hill.
sentences.cn: 丽东酒店位于陡峭的半山腰上。

sentences.en: the problems of one old actor don't amount to a hill of beans.
sentences.cn: 一个老演员的问题根本不足挂齿。

sentences.en: Their house is on a hill overlooking the sea.
sentences.cn: 他们的房子建在可以俯视大海的小山上。

sentences.en: Walker had the unenviable task of breaking the bad news to Hill.
sentences.cn: 沃克不得不把这个坏消息告诉希尔。

sentences.en: You will see the chapel on the hill to your left.
sentences.cn: 你会看见那座小教堂在你左侧的山上。

words.tran_cn: 丘陵的；陡的；多小山的；多坡的

phrases.tran_cn: (北美，非正式)一文不值；毫无价值之物
(非正式)上了年纪的，走下坡的，过了巅峰时期的
衰微，走下坡：过了全盛时期

trans.tran_en: an area of land that is higher than the land around it, like a mountain but smaller
an area of land that is higher than the land around it, like a mountain but smaller
